'''Today, This Seal &mdash; Tomorrow, Watatsumi Island!''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to activate the four Electro [[Elemental Monument]]s around the rundown shrine on the eastmost islet of [[Watatsumi Island]], in the order shown when interacting with the nearby [[Mysterious Pillar]].
